meanings.definition: Receiving or transmitting signals in all directions.
meanings.sent1: The omnidirectional antenna picked up signals from every direction.
meanings.sent2: The omnidirectional microphone captured sounds from all around the room.
meanings.sent3: The omnidirectional security camera could see everything, even the sneaky squirrel!
meanings.sent4: Her omnidirectional awareness of her surroundings was like having eyes in the back of her head.
meanings.sent5: The omnidirectional speaker system filled the room with music, reaching every corner effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Capable of detecting or transmitting signals from all directions.
meanings.sent1: The omnidirectional radar system could track multiple targets simultaneously.
meanings.sent2: The omnidirectional sensor array provided complete coverage of the area.
meanings.sent3: The omnidirectional radio receiver never missed a beat, even in the noisiest environments.
meanings.sent4: His omnidirectional vision allowed him to anticipate threats from any angle.
meanings.sent5: The omnidirectional flashlight illuminated the entire room, revealing hidden corners and shadows.
